post.content_html:
This is the first weeks' summary of our Halloween event . Check out what happened in the first week and stay tuned for the next event taking place on October 15th!

100k Competition

This first week was disputed and fought until the last minute but RaikiriDragon guaranteed the first position taking a generous 50k coins prize home ðŸ’° Congratulations to all the top 10 winners!

In-game event

Hosted by Tweeday, we watched 3 disputed games where our staff played vs the CSGORoll users. The winners of each match would take home a Shadow Dagger | Slaughter (Factory New). Check out the results below:

Game 1:

Do you wanna participate in the next in-game event? Check out how you can here .

That's all for the first week. Thank you for participating and stay tuned for the second week of events, which have already begun.

Missed the stream? Don't worry. You can still watch the full video HERE .
